pages.text: MIMI includes several keybinds that allow you to perform various actions in-game. Note that at this time the key controls associated with the Instrument GUI are not configurable.

pages.title: Stop All Notes
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.alloff)$()$(br2)Pressing this key immediately stops all notes that are on. This is primarily meant to be used if a note gets stuck on for a long period of time.$(br2)Note that this bind does not stop new notes from being turned on.

pages.title: Open MIDI Config GUI
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.settings)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the $(l:configuration_midi_input)MIDI Input Device Configuration GUI$(/l). This GUI allows you to select the system MIDI device to use for MIDI input in MIMI.
